page.title: 14TUNNEL CEMENT
page.content: Tunnel Cement works dominates our view and employs 26 people from Cheddington. From the outside it looks small,but once you are on the site it looks huge. Inside Tunnel Cement there are two plants a wet plant and a dry plant.Mr J.Dymond showed us around,when we visited.First we went to the dry plant. We walked underneath kiln 5 it was 500 celcius inside.As we walked by we saw a pile of something which we thought was solid,we stepped in it up to our shins.Next we looked at the chimneys, Mr. Dymond said that they were allowed one pinch of dust per cubic metre.Then we went to kiln 4,we were allowed to go up close and then we were allowed to look inside,but first we put on some smoked glasses.Tunnel Cement produces tonnes of cement a week.
